sentences.sContent: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.sCn: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.sContent: ...an employee at Danny's Cycles in Gramercy also said Citi Bike is a good option for people to ease into biking in a city famed for its traffic jams and aggressive drivers...
...the beautiful words and sentences flowing in the pages of excellent literature can greatly ease our tiredness...
...his critics complained that the products and systems he designed were closed and inflexible, in the name of greater ease of use...

exam.question: Any donation you can give will help us ________the suffering and isolation of the homeless this New Year.

answer.explain: ease the suffering： 减轻痛苦。 句意： 您所给我们的任何捐赠都会帮助我们解除今年新年无家可归者的痛苦和孤独。 lift： 提高； patch： 修补， 补缀， 掩饰； comfort： 安慰， 使缓和。

synos.tran: 减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动

phrases.pCn: ◎自我安慰，泄愤，出气；抛弃心头的烦闷
感到心安理得；感到轻松
缓和紧张状况；缓和紧张局势
回软；售后回租；轻轻拉回
不畅快；局促不安；心神不宁

trans.tranOther: Ease is the state of being very comfortable and able to live as you want, without any worries or problems
if something unpleasant eases, or if you ease it, it gradually improves or becomes less
